body_html:
I did some more tests. If I repeat several runs, some are getting further than 0% and the exception is different:

...
Train Epoch: 1 [59520/60000 (99%)]	Loss: 0.583770
THCudaCheck FAIL file=/opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1532582123400/work/aten/src/THC/generic/THCStorage.cpp line=36 error=6 : the launch timed out and was terminated
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "main.py", line 109, in <module>
    main()
  File "main.py", line 105, in main
    test(args, model, device, test_loader)
  File "main.py", line 49, in test
    test_loss += F.nll_loss(output, target, reduction='sum').item() # sum up batch loss
RuntimeError: cuda runtime error (6) : the launch timed out and was terminated at /opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1532582123400/work/aten/src/THC/generic/THCStorage.cpp:36

I also tested cuda-memcheck. It reports some errors, but I don't know if it's related:

$ cuda-memcheck --tool racecheck python main.py

body:
I did some more tests. If I repeat several runs, some are getting further than 0% and the exception is different:
```
...
Train Epoch: 1 [59520/60000 (99%)]	Loss: 0.583770
THCudaCheck FAIL file=/opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1532582123400/work/aten/src/THC/generic/THCStorage.cpp line=36 error=6 : the launch timed out and was terminated
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "main.py", line 109, in <module>
    main()
  File "main.py", line 105, in main
    test(args, model, device, test_loader)
  File "main.py", line 49, in test
    test_loss += F.nll_loss(output, target, reduction='sum').item() # sum up batch loss
RuntimeError: cuda runtime error (6) : the launch timed out and was terminated at /opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1532582123400/work/aten/src/THC/generic/THCStorage.cpp:36
```
